function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exaggeration of pandemic estimates and case fatality rate","Impact":"Misleading public and policymakers, leading to inappropriate response measures","Mitigation":"Verify and fact-check estimates before circulating them, emphasize the need for accurate and evidence-based information","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, data analysis and modeling software","People":"General public, policymakers, scientists","Owner":"Fact-checking organizations, scientists, policymakers"}]}
